creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: torque made from one ring of hollow silver; ring curves over on itself and becomes a phoenix-like bird at each end; relief motifs include a dragon at center, bird on either side; on left side next to bird is a dragon face; on right side next to bird is another fierce looking bird; flower near each end; connection covered in wrapped and coiled fine wire
title: Torque
